overview:
## Return Value

An array of custom [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] objects.

## Discussion

The document browser displays an activity view when the user shares a document (for example, when the user long presses a document and then chooses Share from the Edit Menu).

Implement this method to add custom activities to the activity view. Create and return an array containing your custom [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] subclasses. Your [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] subclasses should perform actions on the URLs passed to this method.

# documentBrowser(_:applicationActivitiesForDocumentURLs:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate for additional activities when displaying an activity view.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func documentBrowser(_ controller: UIDocumentBrowserViewController, applicationActivitiesForDocumentURLs documentURLs: [URL]) -> [UIActivity]
```

## Parameters

- **controller**: The current document browser.
- **documentURLs**: The URL of one or more documents to share.

## Return Value

An array of custom [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] objects.

## Discussion

The document browser displays an activity view when the user shares a document (for example, when the user long presses a document and then chooses Share from the Edit Menu).

Implement this method to add custom activities to the activity view. Create and return an array containing your custom [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] subclasses. Your [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity] subclasses should perform actions on the URLs passed to this method.



## Working with the browser’s activity view

- **documentBrowser(_:willPresent:)**: Tells the delegate that the document browser will display an activity view.
